籤詩版本二:
Yiba nembeko kwaye ube nembeko xa ungena kwaye uphuma, nyaniseka kwaye uthembeke, kwaye uwathobele amazwi akho.
Ingqondo ayicacanga kwaye ithule, ilanga elibomvu elibomvu liphakathi
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso welanga elibomvu elikhanya esibhakabhakeni.
Yonke into ihamba njengoko bekucwangcisiwe.
解曰: Akukho nto engqondweni. Amanzi asekwindla acacile. Akukho mfuneko yakuthandabuza. Izinto zenzeka ngokwemvelo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Taoyuan wenze isifungo sobuzalwana
Ekupheleni kwe-Eastern Han Dynasty, ihlabathi lalikwisiphithiphithi, kwaye amasela eTurban eYellow ayebangela isiphithiphithi kuyo yonke indawo.
ULiu Bei, uGuan Yu kunye noZhang Fei, abantu abathathu abaneembono eziphakamileyo, babenemibono efanayo yaye bexhomekeke omnye komnye ngamazwi nangezenzo zabo ukuze benze injongo enkulu bekunye. , yaye benza umsitho kwisitiya seentyatyambo zeepesika (ngoku ebizwa ngokuba yiDolophu yaseSonglindian, kwisiXeko saseZhuozhou, kwiPhondo laseHebei) Baba ngabahlobo abafungiswayo ngewayini, benza isifungo ezulwini, babelana ngobunzima, babelana ngobunzima, babelana ngeentsikelelo, yaye ngokudibeneyo bayibona intle loo nto. ilungele ukuvuselela i-Han Dynasty. Aba bathathu baba ngabazalwana abafungisiweyo, bekungo March iintyatyambo zepesika sele zidubule, ibisaziwa njenge "Three Brothers in the Peach Garden".
聖意: Ukhuseleko lwasekhaya, ubutyebi, ubutyebi, ubunzima bokuthengiselana, umtshato, ingozi, abahambi ngeenyawo bavalela amasimi, i-silkworms, imfuyo, abantu abalahlekileyo, izimangalo, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa kwempahla, ukugula, ukumisa, ukuthumela engcwabeni entabeni, ithamsanqa.
